article.name: Featured Product
article.description: Add a Featured Product for this post

article.name: Photos by
article.description: Author of photography on the post

article.name: External Link
article.description: Add an external link for press posts

article.description: Add a name of a news outlet to feature in external link for press posts

article.description: Hide this blog post from google indexing (for press posts)

article.name: Press Release
article.description: (Optional) Display this post as a press release

blog.name: Cover Image
blog.description: The image to be displayed on menu and social share

collection.name: Collection Navigation Image
collection.description: Add a featured image to this collection to be displayed in collection navigation

collection.name: Global Navigation Image
collection.description: Add an image for main navigation for top-level product collections

page.name: Featured Image
page.description: The image to be displayed on menu and social share

product.description: Front-facing image, square

product.description: Product Image, Front Facing, Cropped close to package

product.description: Product Image, angled view, square crop

product.description: Product Image, Nutrition Facts Side, Square Crop

product.name: Featured Reviews
product.description: Link specific reviews to be featured for this product.

product.name: Featured Reviews Image
product.description: Add an image for the featured reviews section

product.name: Product Display Title
product.description: Add.a display title describing the flavor, etc. (e.g. "Traditional")

product.name: Product Type (Short)
product.description: A shortened version of the product type, used for product cards

product.name: Product Type (Full)
product.description: Full-length product type/category, on PDP and PCP

product.name: Ingredients List
product.description: Add a list of ingredients as an unordered list

product.name: Scroll Scene Stills
product.description: Add a set of files that comprise a desktop scroll scene

product.name: Product Lifestyle Image
product.description: Used below PDP purchasing

product.name: Product Accent Color
product.description: Add an accent color associated with this product (flavor dropdown)

product.name: Media Card - Text
product.description: Add a short amount of text for a media card on the PDP

product.name: Media Card - Image
product.description: Add an optional image for a media card on the PDP

product.name: Unit Size
product.description: Add size per unit (16 oz, etc.)

product.name: Description 2
product.description: Add a below-the-fold subscription (2 of 2)

product.name: Description 1
product.description: Add an above-the-fold product description (1 of 2)

product.name: Caffeine Amount
product.description: Add a caffeine amount in mg

product.name: Product Feature Categories
product.description: Add tags for revelant features, such as "sparkling" or "Low Calorie"

product.name: Product Card Tag
product.description: Add a custom tag to display on product cards (e.g. "Bestseller")

product.name: Product Card Hover Image
product.description: Add an image to be shown on hover on a product card

product.name: Scroll Scene Stills - 2
product.description: A second field for inputting product scroll stills above Frame 50

product.name: Search product boosts
product.description: List of search queries for which a product gets higher rank in search results

product.name: Related products
product.description: List of related products

product.name: Related products settings
product.description: Determines how related products are displayed along with algorithmic product recommendations

product.name: Complementary products
product.description: List of complementary products

product.name: Short Description
product.description: Add a short description used on blog Featured Product module

product.name: MikMak UPC
product.description: Add a UPC to enable the MikMak store locator widget

product.description: (Optional) Richtext field to display on merchandise detail card

product.description: (Optional) Add an image for an optional merchandise detail feature

product.name: Product rating
product.description: Average rating from customers

product.name: Product rating count
product.description: Total number of ratings from customers

product.name: Google: Custom Product
product.description: Use to indicate whether or not the unique product identifiers (UPIs) GTIN, MPN, and brand are available for your product.

product.name: Color
product.description: Defines the primary color or pattern, such as blue or striped

product.name: Dietary preferences
product.description: Helps identify products suitable for specific diets, e.g. vegan, nut free

product.name: Tea input type
product.description: Specifies the preparation style of tea, e.g. bags, K-cups

product.name: Flavor
product.description: Specifies the taste or flavor of a product, e.g. vanilla, mint

product.name: Dietary supplements
product.description: Identifies the added nutrients in a product, like calcium or probiotics

variant.description: The country of the size system used by your product.
